title: Shea Moisture Shea Butter Leave in Conditioner 8oz

title: Aubrey Organics - Island Natural Conditioner, 11 fl oz liquid
description: For Dry, Frizzy Hair            Dry, frizzy flyaways got you frazzled? Instant       moisture-replenishing conditioner and detangler puts your hair       at ease, restoring manageability and sheen with rich plant       butters. Leaves lengths silky-smooth and softens and defines       curls without weighing down the hair. Also recommended for       relaxed and natural styles.
